程序包 cms.service.question.impl

类 QuestionServiceBean

java.lang.Object
cms.service.besa.DaoSupport<Question>
cms.service.question.impl.QuestionServiceBean
所有已实现的接口:
DAO<Question>, QuestionService
@Service @Transactional public class QuestionServiceBean extends DaoSupport<Question> implements QuestionService
问题管理实现类

    • updateQuestion

      public Integer updateQuestion(Question question, List<QuestionTagAssociation> questionTagAssociationList, boolean changePointSymbol, Long changePoint, boolean changeAmountSymbol, BigDecimal changeAmount, Object pointLogObject, Object paymentLogObject)
      修改问题
      指定者:
      updateQuestion 在接口中 QuestionService
      参数:
      question - 问题
      questionTagAssociationList - 问题标签关联集合
      changePointSymbol - 变更积分符号 true：问题增加积分 false：问题减少积分
      changePoint - 变更积分
      changeAmountSymbol - 变更金额符号 true：问题增加金额 false：问题减少金额
      changeAmount - 变更金额
      pointLogObject - 用户悬赏积分日志
      paymentLogObject - 用户悬赏金额日志
      返回:
